metadata.title: CVE-2024-47710 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sock_map: Add a cond_resched() in sock_hash_free()Several syzbot soft lockup reports all have in common sock_hash_free()If a map with a large number of buckets is destroyed, we need to yieldthe cpu when needed.
